com.chuchro.ucbx.javax4362.craps
Class PropositionBet

java.lang.Object
  com.chuchro.ucbx.javax4362.craps.Bet
      com.chuchro.ucbx.javax4362.craps.PropositionBet

public class PropositionBet
extends Bet

A Proposition bet is on one roll bet that wins only one of the winning point is rolled on the subsequent roll. The minimum amount for each of these bets is $1. The payout schedule is as follows:

Bet Winning Roll(s) Amount Multiple Example
Field 3,4,9,10,11 1:1 $1 bet pays $1
Any Craps 2,3,12 8:1 $1 bet pays $8
Aces 2 31:1 $1 bet pays $31
Ace Deuce 3 16:1 $1 bet pays $16
Any Seven 7 5:1 $1 bet pays $5
Yo 11 16:1 $1 bet pays $16
Twelve 12 31:1 $1 bet pays $31

Author:
Doug Chuchro

PROP_BET_TYPE_MAP

private static final java.util.Map<PropositionBet.PropositionBetType,PropositionBet.PropositionBetInfo> PROP_BET_TYPE_MAP
Static lookup table of Proposition bets and their corresponding attribute values. This table (in the form of a Map) is populated by the static method createPropBetTypeMap().
